short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you view and easily search through your Reddit user history (saved links, liked, etc).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wish you could easily search through your reddit saved and liked posts history? With the wealth of information that is posted to reddit every single day, having an easily accessed and curated list of your most loved posts can be really handy. This extension lets you view and easily search through your reddit user history (saved and liked posts). You can also export your posts to your Chrome bookmarks for your enjoyment even if you're not logged in.
